The solution: couriers across countries and diplomatic negotiations to get the potentially life-changing investigational treatment to the patient’s home. 4/4

“We knew we had to try everything possible to get the investigational treatment to her because stopping could potentially have negative consequences for her health,” says Elena Ravasi, a leader of the team. 3/4
As borders closed and transit stopped across Europe, a @NovartisItalia clinical trials team needed to get an experimental treatment to a #breastcancer patient living in Eastern Europe. 2/4
We’re working to overcome the challenges of #COVID19 and keep our trials on track and participants in treatment. 1/4
